Audio is out of synchro. 
If you use an AC3 filter go to System and set -5000ms Audio/Video sync Time shift. That can help.
you have the greatest uploads on the net.....thank you for ur hard work!!!!! lol u made my girlfriend happy that we have a ps3 :)

What is up the A/V Sync issues? Got the same problem with your SAW upload too! What is the problem here, and how can I fix it?
Using
MPC-Home Cinema, CoreAVC 2, FFDShow Audio decoders, Haali Splitter.
For those with the CCCP codec pack with the Halli splitter and ffdshow audio decoder, set the audio for -5000ms and your sound should sync fine.
Actually, any decoder that allows for manual setting should take that same setting, but I know it works for ffdshow.

Guys, to those of your worried about getting busted by your ISP use PeerBlock and run it while downloading/uploading. I have used this for a long time now and the only times I received warnings from my ISP was when I forgot to turn it on.

The sound is off. It's both not in sync with the video (which is an easy fix) but it's also encoded incorrectly. There is something very weird about the 6 channels - only the left is projecting all the main sound. The right speaker is acting as a back. It's all wrong.
